name: Nostalgia 1907
description: Nostalgia 1907 is a Sharp X68000, Sega Mega-CD, NEC PC-9801, and FM Towns adventure video game set in the year 1907. During this time known as either the Edwardian era or the "Age of Men," the player must explore the exotic locales of that era (including the North Atlantic Ocean) and follow along with the story. Drinking alcoholic beverages is considered to be part of the cut scene (as two men are drinking wine). All the text in the game is in Japanese; literacy skills are required in order to play the game.
